content: <script type = "text/javscript"> var input = window.prompt("enter name"); document.write("hello" + input); var enteredNum; var allNumbers = ""; for(var i = 0; i < 3; i++) {enteredNum = window.prompt("please enter a number"); allNumbers += enteredNum + " "; }  var count = 0;  while(count < 3) {enteredNum = window.prompt("please enter a number");  allNumbers += enteredNum + " ";  count++; }  document.write(allNumbers); </script>
